ygData.subject: Re: Kobold Vs Tier'Dal
ygData.msgSnippet: O.K....I think I am still quite confused here. My languages that I speak...are... Common, Elder Elvish, Elvish, Dwarven, Dark Elvish, Elder Tier Dal, Erudian,
ygData.messageBody:
O.K....I think I am still quite confused here.

My languages that I speak...are...

Common, Elder Elvish, Elvish, Dwarven, Dark Elvish, Elder
Tier'Dal, Erudian, Old Erudian, Gnoll, Barbarian, Gnomish,
Halfling, Dark Speech, Kobold, Ogre, Troll, Goblin, Lizard
man, froglok, Combine (Giant's Tongue), Thieves Cant, Orc,
Farie.

In that list I definatly see two different languages...one
for Kobold, and one for Elder Tier'Dal.

Also my guild master teached Elder Tier'Dal, and
Kobold............

So why is this the same language?
